meanings.definition: To fasten or join with superglue.
meanings.sent1: I am supergluing the broken pieces of my favorite mug back together.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys supergluing her artwork to create unique collages.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy magician ended up supergluing his wand to his hat by mistake.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a way of supergluing themselves to my memory, never to be forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The idea of supergluing the puzzle pieces together to frame it was brilliant.

meanings.definition: The act of using superglue to bond objects together.
meanings.sent1: After the supergluing, the figurine was as good as new.
meanings.sent2: The supergluing of the model airplane required precision and patience.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's secret power was supergluing things together with a touch.
meanings.sent4: The friendship between them was like a strong supergluing, unbreakable and lasting.
meanings.sent5: The supergluing of the broken vase was a delicate task, but she managed it beautifully.
